medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Reportedly presented in September 2003 after discontinuing anticoagulation for 6 months while continuing intravenous drug abuse. Symptoms included massive aortic regurgitation and an estimated ejection fraction of 15%.
medical_history.past_medical_history: History of Marfan syndrome, aortic root replacement with a mechanical prosthesis due to symptomatic aneurysmal dilation of the aortic root and aortic regurgitation.
medical_history.social_history: History of intravenous drug abuse and discontinuation of anticoagulation.
